Articles.Content:
Not quite...not quite

The user below me is rebellious

Nope.Follow human instructions ,and orders 24/7.

user below me is in space.

FALSE.

The next user (or "The user below me" if you perfer) is in the Northern Hemisphere.

Yes

The user below me plays starmade?

True. Still experimenting...

The next user plays Distant Worlds. (No expansions or with expansions.)

Nope.

The user below me will have to type more than ten characters for their reply to be permitted.

No, I have to answer and then ask a question which means that I have to type more than 10 characters for a different reason.

The user below me is stupid.

Since if you never did a stupid thing, you are doing nothing, so... (thinking the past) technically yeah.

The next user is doing nothing (applies to those who thought they are smart).

No, I just finished reading the best EULA ever, and now I'm writing a forum post.

The user below me uses a keyboard to type.

yup

The user below me is part of the Enigma/PfL gang

Nope, I have no idea what it is!

The next user has no ideas.

Nope, I have ideas!

The next user hasn't landed on Dres.

(I did it without landing legs!)

true

the user below me has to pee

False.

People miss me?

Heck yeah.

The user below me Has a postcard image in their signature

Nope.

The user below me hasn't set up a Mun station

True!

The user below me has used IRC before

I don't think so.

The next user thinks KLF is not obsolete.

What is KLF?

The user below me uses no mods, but is not a jerk about it.

First, false. Second, true.

The next user uses too much mods.

False. But I don't hate mods, I'm not a purist.

User below me is an epitome of my definition of a "part purist".

True, I can adapt if KSP has mods or not.

The user below me wants me to stop wasting time playing games and actually update my programs.

False. Games are good for you!

The user below me is Canopus

Hahahahahahahaha! No. I think not.

The user below me has never had Chick-Fill-A Sauce.

What's that?

The next user knows what's going on in the forum.
